# Keywords

**Keywords** are special tokens in the language which have reserved use in the language. Keywords may not be used as identifiers in Java — you cannot declare a field whose name is a keyword, for instance.

Examples of keywords are the primitive types, `int` and `boolean`; the control flow statements `for` and `if`; access modifiers such as `public`, and special words which mark the declaration and definition of Java classes, packages, and interfaces: `class`, `package`, `interface`.

Below are all the Java language keywords:

- `abstract`
- `assert` (since Java 1.4)
- `boolean`
- `break`
- `byte`
- `case`
- `catch`
- `char`
- `class`
- `const` (not used)
- `continue`
- `default`
- `do`
- `double`
- `else`
- `enum` (since Java 5.0)
- `extends`
- `final`
- `finally`
- `float`
- `for`
- `goto` (not used)
- `if`
- `implements`
- `import`
- `instanceof`
- `int`
- `interface`
- `long`
- `native`
- `new`
- `package`
- `private`
- `protected`
- `public`
- `return`
- `short`
- `static`
- `strictfp` (since Java 1.2)
- `super`
- `switch`
- `synchronized`
- `this`
- `throw`
- `throws`
- `transient`
- `try`
- `void`
- `volatile`
- `while````html

## abstract

<p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" title="Java Programming/Keywords/abstract">abstract</a></span></code> 是 Java 關鍵字。它可以應用於類和方法。 <i>abstract</i> 類不能直接實例化。它必須放在變量類型或方法返回類型的前面。建議把它放在訪問修飾符之後以及 <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/static" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/static" title="Java Programming/Keywords/static">static</a></span></code> 關鍵字之後。非抽象類是 <i>具體</i> 類。抽象類不能是 <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/final" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/final" title="Java Programming/Keywords/final">final</a></span></code>。</p>

<p>只有抽象類可以有抽象方法。抽象方法僅聲明，不實現：</p>

## assert

`assert` is a Java [keyword](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/assert) used to define an *assert statement*. An assert statement is used to declare an expected boolean condition in a program. If the program is running with assertions enabled, then the condition is checked at runtime. If the condition is false, the Java runtime system [throws](https://en.wikibooks.org/w/index.php?title=Java_Programming/Statements/throw&action=edit&redlink=1) an `AssertionError`.

Assertions may be declared using the following syntax:

```java
assert expression1 [: expression2];
```

`expression1` is a boolean that will throw the assertion if it is false. When it is thrown, the assertion error exception is created with the parameter `expression2` (if applicable).

An example:

```java
assert list != null && list.size() > 0 : "list variable is null or empty";
Object value = list.get(0);
```

Assertions are usually used as a debugging aid. They should not be used instead of validating arguments to public methods, or in place of a more precise runtime error exception.

Assertions are enabled with the Java `-ea` or `-enableassertions` runtime option. See your Java environment documentation for additional options for controlling assertions.

## boolean

`boolean` is a [keyword](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/boolean) which designates the `boolean` [primitive type](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types). There are only two possible `boolean` values: `true` and `false`. The default value for `boolean` fields is `false`.
```
```markdown
以下是一個名為`initialized`的`private` `boolean`欄位的聲明，及其在名為`synchronizeConnection`的方法中的使用。

代碼段1: 連接同步。
```java
private boolean initialized = false;

public void synchronizeConnection() {
   if (!initialized) {
      connection = connect();
      initialized = true;
   }
}
```

前面的代碼僅在第一次方法調用時創建連接。請注意，在一些語言（如C語言）中，整數類型（如`int`）與`boolean`之間不存在自動轉換。因此，必須使用等效表達式，例如`(i != 0)`，它當`i`不為零時為`true`。

## `break`

`break`是一個Java關鍵字。

在循環中跳出（中斷）。也可在`switch`語句中使用。

例如:
```java
for (int i=0; i < maxLoopIter; i++) {
   System.out.println("Iter= " + i);
   if (i == 5) {
      break;  // -- 5 iteration is enough --
   }
}
```
```
```markdown
See also:

- [Java Programming/Keywords/switch](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/switch)

## byte
`byte` is a [keyword](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords) which designates the 8 bit signed integer [primitive type](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types).

The `java.lang.Byte` class is the nominal wrapper class when you need to store a `byte` value but an object reference is required.

Syntax:
```java
byte <variable-name> = <integer-value>;
```

For example:

```java
byte b = 65;
```
or

```java
byte b = 'A';
```

The number 65 is the code for 'A' in [ASCII](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ASCII).

See also:

- [Java Programming/Primitive Types](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types)

## case
`case` is a Java keyword.

This is part of the `switch` statement, to find if the value passed to the switch statement matches a value followed by case.

For example:

```java
int i = 3;
switch (i) {
    case 1:
        System.out.println("The number is 1.");
        break;
    case 2:
        System.out.println("The number is 2.");
        break;
    case 3:
        System.out.println("The number is 3."); // this line will print
        break;
    case 4:
        System.out.println("The number is 4.");
        break;
    case 5:
        System.out.println("The number is 5.");
        break;
    default:
        System.out.println("The number is not 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.");
}
```
```## catch
`catch` is a keyword.
It's part of a `try` block. If an exception is thrown inside a try block, the exception will be compared to any of the catch part of the block. If the exception match with one of the exception in the catch part, the exception will be handled there.

For example:

| ![Computer code](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png) | 
|---|
```java
try {
   //...
     throw new MyException_1();
   //...
}
catch ( MyException_1 e ) {
   // --- Handle the Exception_1 here --
}
catch ( MyException_2 e ) {
   // --- Handle the Exception_2 here --
}
```

See also:
- [Java Programming/Keywords/try](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try)

## char
`char` is a keyword. It defines a character primitive type. `char` can be created from character literals and numeric representation. Character literals consist of a single quote character (') (ASCII 39, hex 0x27), a single character, and a close quote ('), such as 'w'. Instead of a character, you can also use unicode escape sequences, but there must be exactly one.

Syntax:

```
char variable name1 = 'character1';
```

### Code section 1: Three examples.
```java
char oneChar1 = 'A';
char oneChar2 = 65;
char oneChar3 = '\u0041';
System.out.println(oneChar1);
System.out.println(oneChar2);
System.out.println(oneChar3);
```

### Output for Code section 1
```java
A
A
A
``````html

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="class">class</span></h2>
<p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/class" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/class" title="Java Programming/Keywords/class">class</a></span></code> is a Java keyword which begins the declaration and definition of a <a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Classes_and_Objects" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Classes_and_Objects" title="Java Programming/Classes and Objects">class</a>.</p>
<p>The general syntax of a class declaration, using <a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Programming_Languages/Syntax_Specification" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Programming_Languages/Syntax_Specification" title="Programming Languages/Syntax Specification">Extended Backus-Naur Form</a>, is</p>
<pre>class-declaration ::= [<i><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Access_Modifiers" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Access_Modifiers" class="mw-redirect" title="Java Programming/Access Modifiers">access-modifiers</a></i>] <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/class" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/class" title="Java Programming/Keywords/class">class</a></span></code> <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/w/index.php?title=Java_Programming/Keywords/identifier&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/w/index.php?title=Java_Programming/Keywords/identifier&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Java Programming/Keywords/identifier (does not exist)">identifier</a></span></code>
                      [<i>extends-clause</i>] [<i>implements-clause</i>] 
                      <i>class-body</i>
extends-clause ::= <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/extends" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/extends" title="Java Programming/Keywords/extends">extends</a></span></code> <i>class-name</i>
implements-clause ::= <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/implements" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/implements" title="Java Programming/Keywords/implements">implements</a></span></code> <i>interface-names</i> 
interface-names ::= <i>interface-name</i> [<code>,</code> <i>interface-names</i>]
class-body ::= <b><code>{</code></b> [<i>member-declarations</i>] <b><code>}</code></b>
member-declarations = <i>member-declaration</i> [<i>member-declarations</i>]
member-declaration = <i>field-declaration</i> 
                     | <i>initializer</i> 
                     | <i>constructor</i> 
                     | <i>method-declaration</i>
                     | <i>class-declaration</i>
</pre>
<p>The <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/extends" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/extends" title="Java Programming/Keywords/extends">extends</a></span></code> word is optional. If omitted, the class extends the <code><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/API/java.lang.Object" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/API/java.lang.Object" title="Java Programming/API/java.lang.Object">Object</a></code> class, as all Java classes inherit from it.</p>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="const">const</span></h2>
<p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/const" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/const" title="Java Programming/Keywords/const">const</a></span></code> is a <b>reserved keyword</b>, presently not being used.</p>
<p>In other programming languages, such as C, const is often used to declare a constant. However, in Java, <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/final" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/final" title="Java Programming/Keywords/final">final</a></span></code> is used instead.</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="continue">continue</span></h2>
<p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/continue" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/continue" title="Java Programming/Keywords/continue">continue</a></span></code> is a Java keyword. It skips the remainder of the loop and continues with the next iteration.</p>

## default
`default` is a Java keyword.
This is an optional part of the `switch` statement, which only executes if none of the above cases are matched.
See also:
- [Java Programming/Keywords/switch](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/switch)

## do
`do` is a Java keyword.
It starts a do-while looping block. The do-while loop is functionally similar to the while loop, except the condition is evaluated *after* the statements execute

Syntax:

```java
do {
    //statements;
} while (condition);
```

For example:

```java
do {
    i++;
} while (i < maxLoopIter);
```
See also:
- [Java Programming/Statements](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Statements)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/for](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/for)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/while](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/while)

The `java.lang.Double` class is the nominal wrapper class when you need to store a `double` value but an object reference is required.
``````html
Syntax:
double &lt;variable-name&gt; = &lt;float-value&gt;;

```

  See also:</p><ul>

</ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="else">else</span></h2><p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/else" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/else" title="Java Programming/Keywords/else">else</a></span></code> is a Java keyword. It is an optional part of a branching statement. It starts the 'false' statement block.</p><p>The general syntax of a <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/if" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/if" title="Java Programming/Keywords/if">if</a></span></code>, using <a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Programming_Languages/Syntax_Specification" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Programming_Languages/Syntax_Specification" title="Programming Languages/Syntax Specification">Extended Backus-Naur Form</a>, is</p><pre>branching-statement&nbsp;::= <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/if" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/if" title="Java Programming/Keywords/if">if</a></span></code> <i>condition-clause</i>

                                    <i>single-statement</i> | <i>block-statement</i> ]

## enum
| Computer code | 
| :--- | 
| ```java
/** Grades of courses */
enum Grade { A, B, C, D, F };
// ...
private Grade gradeA = Grade.A;
``` |

This enumeration constant then can be passed in to methods:
| Computer code | 
| :--- | 
| ```java
student.assignGrade(gradeA);
/**
 * Assigns the grade for this course to the student
 * @param GRADE  Grade to be assigned
 */
public void assignGrade(final Grade GRADE) {
  grade = GRADE;
}
``` |

An enumeration may also have parameters:
| Computer code | 
| :--- | 
| ```java
public enum DayOfWeek {
  /** Enumeration constants */
  MONDAY(1), TUESDAY(2), WEDNESDAY(3), THURSDAY(4), FRIDAY(5), SATURDAY(6), SUNDAY(0);
  /** Code for the days of the week */
  private byte dayCode = 0;
  
  /** Private constructor
   * @param VALUE  Value that stands for a day of the week.
   */
  private DayOfWeek(final byte VALUE) {
    dayCode = java.lang.Math.abs(VALUE%7);
  }
  
  /** Gets the day code
   * @return  The day code
   */
  public byte getDayCode() {
    return dayCode;
  }
}
``` |

### extends

`extends` 是Java的一個關鍵字。

用於`class`和`interface`定義中，聲明要擴展的類或介面。

語法：

```
public class MyClass extends SuperClass {<br>  //...<br>}
public interface MyInterface extends SuperInterface{<br>  //...<br>}
```

Java 1.5及以後的版本中，“extends” 關鍵字也用於指定泛型中類型參數的上限。
``````markdown
| <img alt="Computer code" src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png" width="32" height="32"> | <div class="mw-highlight mw-highlight-lang-java mw-content-ltr" dir="ltr">
<pre><span></span><span class="kd">class</span> <span class="nc">Foo</span><span class="o">&lt;</span><span class="n">T</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="kd">extends</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="n">Number</span><span class="o">&gt;</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">{</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="cm">/*...*/</span><span class="w"> </span><span class="p">}</span>

## final
`final` is a keyword. Beware! It has distinct meanings depending whether it is used for a class, a method, or for a variable. It must be placed before the variable type or the method return type. It is recommended to place it after the access modifier and after the `static` keyword.

| <img alt="Example" src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6a/Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg/32px-Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg.png" width="32" height="32"> | <span id="code-section-1"><b>Code section 1: Keyword order.</b></span>
<div class="mw-highlight mw-content-ltr mw-highlight-lines" dir="ltr">
<pre>private static final long serialVersionUID = -5437975414336623381L;</pre>
</div> |
For a variable
The `final` keyword only allows a single assignment for the variable. That is to say, once the variable has been assigned, its value is in read-only. If the variable is a primitive type, its value will no longer change. If it is an object, only its reference will no longer change. Keep in mind that its value can still be changed.

## 警告
| <img alt="Warning" src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f7/Nuvola_apps_important.svg/32px-Nuvola_apps_important.svg.png" width="32" height="27"> | <span style="color: red;"><b>Code section 2: Forbidden double assignment.</b></span>
<div class="mw-highlight mw-content-ltr mw-highlight-lines" dir="ltr">
<pre>final int a = 1;
a = 2;</pre>
</div> |
``````markdown
---

最終變數通常用於通用常數，如 [pi 的維基百科頁面](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/pi)：

![Example](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6a/Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg/32px-Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg.png)

### Code section 3: 只修改物件的值。
```java
final ArrayList list = new ArrayList();
System.out.println(list.size());
list.add("One item");
System.out.println(list.size());
```

A final variable is often used for universal constants, such as pi:

![Example](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6a/Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg/32px-Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg.png)

### Code section 4: Pi 常數。
```java
static final double PI = 3.1415926;
```

```plain
``````markdown
The `final` keyword can also be used for method parameters:

Code section 5: Final method parameter.
```java
public int method(final int inputInteger) {
   int outputInteger = inputInteger + 1;
   return outputInteger;
}
```

It is useful for methods that use side effects to update some objects. Such methods modify the content of an object passed in parameter. The method caller will receive the object update. This will fail if the object parameter has been reassigned in the method. Another object will be updated instead. Final method parameter can also be used to keep the code clean.

The `final` keyword is similar to `const` in other languages and the `readonly` keyword in [C#](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/C_Sharp_Programming). A final variable cannot be `volatile`.

## For a class
The `final` keyword forbids the creation of a subclass. It is the case of the `Integer` or `String` class.

Code listing 1: SealedClass.java
```java
public final class SealedClass {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
  }
}
```

A final class cannot be `abstract`. The `final` keyword is similar to `sealed` keyword in [C#](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/C_Sharp_Programming).

## For a method
The `final` keyword forbids to overwrite the method in a subclass. It is useless if the class is already final and a private method is implicitly `final`. A final method cannot be `abstract`.

Code listing 2: NoOverwriting.java
```java
public class NoOverwriting {
  public final void sealedMethod() {
  }
}
``` 
```plaintext
## Interest
`final`  關鍵字主要用於保證代碼的良好使用。例如（非`static`）方法，如果該方法足夠小，允許編譯器擴展該方法（類似於內聯函數）。有時是必需的。例如，如果巢狀類需要訪問頂層類的成員，則它們必須是 final。另見 [存取修飾符](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Scope)。

## finally
`finally`  是 `try` 塊的可選結尾部分。

**Code section 1: `try` block.**
```java
try {
  // ...
} catch (MyException1 e) {
  // Handle the Exception1 here
} catch (MyException2 e) {
  // Handle the Exception2 here
} finally {
  // This will always be executed no matter what happens
}
```

`finally` 塊內的代碼將總是被執行，即使在 `try` 塊中有異常或執行了 `return` 陳述。在 `try` 塊中有三種可能性。首先，沒有拋出異常。

**Code section 2: 沒有拋出異常。**
```java
System.out.println("Before the try block");
try {
  System.out.println("Inside the try block");
} catch (MyException1 e) {
  System.out.println("Handle the Exception1");
} catch (MyException2 e) {
  System.out.println("Handle the Exception2");
} finally {
  System.out.println("Execute the finally block");
}
System.out.println("Continue");
```
**Code section 2 的控制檯**
```bash
Before the try block
Inside the try block
Execute the finally block
Continue
```可以看到我們已經在<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try" title="Java Programming/Keywords/try">try</a></span></code>區塊中執行了，然後我們執行了<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" title="Java Programming/Keywords/finally">finally</a></span></code>區塊，然後我們繼續執行。現在，一個捕獲的異常被拋出：</p>

```markdown
![Example](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6a/Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg/32px-Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg.png)

**代碼段3：拋出了一個捕獲的異常。**
```java
System.out.println("Before the try block");
try {
  System.out.println("Enter inside the try block");
  throw new MyException1();
  System.out.println("Terminate the try block");
} catch (MyException1 e) {
  System.out.println("Handle the Exception1");
} catch (MyException2 e) {
  System.out.println("Handle the Exception2");
} finally {
  System.out.println("Execute the finally block");
}
System.out.println("Continue");
```

```markdown
**代碼段3的控制檯**
```java
Before the try block
Enter inside the try block
Handle the Exception1
Execute the finally block
Continue
```

我們已經通過<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try" title="Java Programming/Keywords/try">try</a></span></code>區塊直到異常發生的地方，然後我們執行了匹配的<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/catch" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/catch" title="Java Programming/Keywords/catch">catch</a></span></code>區塊、<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" title="Java Programming/Keywords/finally">finally</a></span></code>區塊，然後我們繼續執行。現在，一個未捕獲的異常被拋出：

```markdown
![Example](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6a/Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg/32px-Nuvola_apps_edu_miscellaneous.svg.png)

**代碼段4：拋出了一個未捕獲的異常。**
```java
System.out.println("Before the try block");
try {
  System.out.println("Enter inside the try block");
  throw new Exception();
  System.out.println("Terminate the try block");
} catch (MyException1 e) {
  System.out.println("Handle the Exception1");
} catch (MyException2 e) {
  System.out.println("Handle the Exception2");
} finally {
  System.out.println("Execute the finally block");
}
System.out.println("Continue");
```

```markdown
**代碼段4的控制檯**
```java
Before the try block
Enter inside the try block
Execute the finally block
```我們已經在<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/try" title="Java Programming/Keywords/try">try</a></span></code>區塊中執行，直到出現異常，並且執行了<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" title="Java Programming/Keywords/finally">finally</a></span></code>區塊。在try-catch區塊之後沒有執行任何代碼。如果在try-catch區塊之前發生異常，則不會執行<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally" title="Java Programming/Keywords/finally">finally</a></span></code>區塊。
如果在finally中使用return語句，它會覆蓋try-catch區塊中的返回語句。例如，構造

```java
 try {
   return 11;
 }  finally {
   return 12;
 }
```

將返回12，而不是11。專業代碼幾乎從不包含更改執行順序的語句（比如<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/return" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/return" title="Java Programming/Keywords/return">return</a></span></code>、<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/break" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/break" title="Java Programming/Keywords/break">break</a></span></code>、<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/continue" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/continue" title="Java Programming/Keywords/continue">continue</a></span></code>），因為這樣的代碼更難閱讀和維護。

## 浮點數

<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/float" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/float" title="Java Programming/Keywords/float">float</a></span></code>是一個< a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords" title="Java Programming/Keywords">關鍵字</a>，用於指定32位浮點<a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types" title="Java Programming/Primitive Types">基本類型</a>。

在需要存儲<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/float" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/float" title="Java Programming/Keywords/float">float</a></span></code>值但需要對象引用時，可以使用<code>java.lang.Float</code>類作為包裝類。

語法：

```java
float <variable-name> = <float-value>;
```

例如：

```java
float price = 49.95;
``````markdown
See also:

- [Java Programming/Primitive Types](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types)

## for
`for` is a Java keyword.

It starts a looping block.

The general syntax of a `for`, using Extended Backus-Naur Form, is

```
for-looping-statement ::= for condition-clause 
                                    single-statement | block-statement

condition-clause   ::= ( before-statement; Boolean Expression; after-statement )
single-statement   ::= Statement
block-statement    ::= { Statement [ Statement ] }
```

For example:

| ![Computer code](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png) | 
| :---: |
| ```java
for ( int i=0; i < maxLoopIter; i++ ) {
    System.println("Iter: " + i);
}
```

See also:

- [Java Programming/Keywords/while](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/while)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/do](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/do)

## goto
`goto` is a *reserved keyword*, presently not being used.

## if
`if` is a Java keyword. It starts a branching statement.

The general syntax of a `if`, using Extended Backus-Naur Form, is

```
branching-statement ::= if condition-clause 
                                    single-statement | block-statement
                       [ else 
                                    single-statement | block-statement ]

condition-clause   ::= ( Boolean Expression )
single-statement   ::= Statement
block-statement    ::= { Statement [ Statements ] }
```

For example:

| ![Computer code](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png) | 
| :---: |
| ```java
if ( boolean Expression )
{
    System.out.println("'True' statement block");
}
else
{
    System.out.println("'False' statement block");
}
```
```另見：
- [Java Programming/Keywords/else](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/else)

## implements
`implements` 是 Java 關鍵詞。

在 `class` 定義中使用，用於聲明要被類別實現的介面。

語法：
```java
public class MyClass implements MyInterface1, MyInterface2
{
   ...
}
```

另見：
- [Java Programming/Creating Objects](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Creating_Objects)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/class](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/class)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/interface](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/interface)

## import
`import` 是 Java 關鍵詞。

宣告要在 import 陳述式下面的代碼中使用的 Java 類別。 一旦宣告了 Java 類別，則可以在代碼中使用類別名稱，而無需指定類別所屬的套件。

使用 '*' 字元來宣告屬於套件的所有類別。

語法：
```java
import package.JavaClass;
import package.*;
```

靜態導入結構允許對靜態成員進行無資格的訪問，而不繼承包含靜態成員的類型：
```java
import static java.lang.Math.PI;
```

一旦導入了靜態成員，它們就可以被無需資格地使用：
```java
double r = cos(PI * theta);
```

注意：非常節儉地使用靜態導入，以避免汙染程式的命名空間！

另見：
- [Java Programming/Packages](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Packages)

## instanceof
`instanceof` 是 關鍵詞。

它檢查對象引用是否是一種類型的實例，並返回一個布爾值；```markdown
&lt;object-reference&gt; `instanceof` `Object` will return true for all non-null object references, since all Java objects are inherited from `Object`. `instanceof` will always return `false` if &lt;object-reference&gt; is `null`.

Syntax:

&lt;object-reference&gt; `instanceof` TypeName

For example:

```java
class Fruit
{
  //...	
}
class Apple extends Fruit
{
  //...
}
class Orange extends Fruit
{
  //...
}
public class Test
{
    public static void main(String[] args)
    {
       Collection<Object> coll = new ArrayList<Object>();
       
       Apple app1 = new Apple();
       Apple app2 = new Apple();
       coll.add(app1);
       coll.add(app2);
       
       Orange or1 = new Orange();
       Orange or2 = new Orange();
       coll.add(or1);
       coll.add(or2);
       
       printColl(coll);
    }
    
    private static String printColl(Collection<?> coll)
    {
       for (Object obj : coll)
       {
          if (obj instanceof Object)
          {
             System.out.print("It is a Java Object and");
          }
          if (obj instanceof Fruit)
          {
             System.out.print("It is a Fruit and");
          }
          if (obj instanceof Apple)
          {
             System.out.println("it is an Apple");
          }
          if (obj instanceof Orange)
          {
             System.out.println("it is an Orange");
          }
       }
    }
}
```
```plaintext
```plaintext運行程式：
```java
java Test
```

輸出：
```java
"It is a Java Object and It is a Fruit and it is an Apple"
"It is a Java Object and It is a Fruit and it is an Apple"
"It is a Java Object and It is a Fruit and it is an Orange"
"It is a Java Object and It is a Fruit and it is an Orange"
```

請注意<code><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/instanceof" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/instanceof" title="Java Programming/Keywords/instanceof">instanceof</a></code>運算符也可應用於介面。例如，如果上面的示例加上介面，並修改類別以實現該介面，我們就可以詢問對象是否可食用。

```java
interface Edible 
{
  //...
}

class Orange extends Fruit implements Edible
{
  //...
}

if (obj instanceof Edible)
{
   System.out.println("it is edible");
}
```## int

`int` is a [keyword](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/int) which designates the 32 bit signed integer [primitive type](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types).

The `java.lang.Integer` class is the nominal wrapper class when you need to store an `int` value but an object reference is required.

Syntax:

```java
int <variable-name> = <integer-value>;
```

For example:

```java
int i = 65;
```

See also:
- [Java Programming/Primitive Types](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types)

{
   public void method1();
   //...
}

The `java.lang.Long` class is the nominal wrapper class when you need to store a `long` value but an object reference is required。```html

</ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="native">native</span></h2><p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/native" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/native" title="Java Programming/Keywords/native">native</a></span></code> is a java keyword. It marks a method, that it will be implemented in other languages, not in Java. The method is declared without a body and cannot be <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" title="Java Programming/Keywords/abstract">abstract</a></span></code>. It works together with <a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Java_Native_Interface" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Java_Native_Interface" title="Java Programming/Java Native Interface">JNI (Java Native Interface)</a>.</p><p>Syntax:</p><pre>[<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/public" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/public" title="Java Programming/Keywords/public">public</a></span></code>|<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/protected" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/protected" title="Java Programming/Keywords/protected">protected</a></span></code>|<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/private" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/private" title="Java Programming/Keywords/private">private</a></span></code>] <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/native" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/native" title="Java Programming/Keywords/native">native</a></span></code> method();
</pre><p>Native methods were used in the past to write performance critical sections but with java getting faster this is now less common. Native methods are currently needed when</p><ul>
 <li>You need to call from java a library, written in another language.</li>
 <li>You need to access system or hardware resources that are only reachable from the other language (typically <a data-savepage-href="/wiki/C_Programming" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/C_Programming" title="C Programming">C</a>). Actually, many system functions that interact with real computer (disk and network IO, for instance) can only do this because they call native code.</li>
</ul><p>To complete writing native method, you need to process your class with <code>javah</code> tool that will generate a header code in C. You then need to provide implementation of the header code, produce dynamically loadable library (<code>.so</code> under Linux, <code>.dll</code> under Windows) and load it (in the simplest case with <code>System.load(library_file_name)</code> . The code completion is trivial if only primitive types like integers are passed but gets more complex if it is needed to exchange strings or objects from the C code. In general, everything can be on C level, including creation of the new objects and calling back methods, written in java.</p><p>To call the code in some other language (including <a data-savepage-href="/wiki/C%2B%2B_Programming" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/C%2B%2B_Programming" title="C++ Programming">C++</a>), you need to write a bridge from C to that language. This is usually trivial as most of languages are callable from C.</p><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also_3">See also</span></h2><ul>
 <li><a rel="nofollow" class="external autonumber" href="http://java.sun.com/developer/onlineTraining/Programming/JDCBook/jni.html">[3]</a> - JNI programming tutorial.</li>
 <li><a rel="nofollow" class="external autonumber" href="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.3/docs/guide/jni/spec/jniTOC.doc.html">[4]</a> - JNI specification.</li>
</ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="new">new</span></h2><p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/new" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/new" title="Java Programming/Keywords/new">new</a></span></code> is a Java keyword. It creates a Java object and allocates memory for it on the heap. <code>new</code> is also used for array creation, as arrays are also objects.</p><p>Syntax:</p><pre>&lt;JavaType&gt; &lt;variable&gt; = <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/new" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/new" title="Java Programming/Keywords/new">new</a></span></code> &lt;JavaObject&gt;();

## package
`package` 是一個Java關鍵字。它宣告了Java類別的“名稱空間”。它必須放置在Java檔的頂部，應該是第一個Java陳述式行。
為了確保套件名稱在供應商之間是唯一的，通常使用公司網址作為開頭。

語法:

```java
package package;
```

例如:

```java
package com.mycompany.myapplication.mymodule;
```

[連結-封裝 (程式設計)](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Packages)
[連結-封裝 (程式設計)](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/import)

## private
`private` 是一個Java關鍵字，它宣告了成員的訪問權限為私有。即成員僅在該類別內可見，而不會在任何其他類別中可見（包括子類別）。私有成員的可見性擴展到巢狀類別。

請注意: 因為存取修飾符不是在實例級別處理，而是在類別級別處理，因此該對象的私有成員可以從同一類別的其他實例中可見！

語法:

```java
private void method();
```
[連結-存取權限修飾符](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Access_Modifiers)

## protected
`protected` 是一個Java關鍵字。

此關鍵字是一個訪問修飾符，在方法或其他類別成員之前使用，表示此方法或變數只能被其自身類別中的元素或相同套件中的類別所訪問（就像對默認可見性級別一樣），而且還可以從其自身 類別的子類別中訪問，包括子類別在外部套件中（如果在此子類別的類型的表達式上進行訪問）。

語法:

```java
protected <returnType> <methodName>(<parameters>);
```

例如:

```java
protected int getAge();

protected void setYearOfBirth(int year);
```

[連結-存取權限修飾符](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Access_Modifiers)```markdown
See also:

- [Java Programming/Scope#Access modifiers](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Scope#Access_modifiers)

## public
`public` is a Java [keyword](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/public) which declares a member's [access](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Scope) as public. Public members are visible to all other classes. This means that any other class can access a `public` field or method. Further, other classes can modify `public` fields unless the field is declared as `final`.

A best practice is to give fields `private` access and reserve `public` access to only the set of methods and `final` fields that define the class' public constants. This helps with encapsulation and information hiding, since it allows you to change the implementation of a class without affecting the consumers who use only the public API of the class.

Below is an example of an immutable `public` class named `Length` which maintains `private` instance fields named `units` and `magnitude` but provides a `public` constructor and two `public` accessor methods.

```java
package org.wikibooks.java;

public class Length {
   private double magnitude;
   private String units;

   public Length(double magnitude, String units) {
      if ((units == null) || (units.trim().length() == 0)) {
          throw new IllegalArgumentException("non-null, non-empty units required.");
      }

      this.magnitude = magnitude;
      this.units = units;
   }

   public double getMagnitude() {
      return this.magnitude;
   }

   public String getUnits() {
      return this.units;
   }
}
```

## return
`return` is a Java keyword.

Returns a primitive value, or an object reference, or nothing(void). It does not return object values, only object references.

Syntax:
```
return variable;  // --- Returns variable
or
return;           // --- Returns nothing
```

## short
`short` is a keyword. It defines a 16 bit signed integer [primitive type](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types).

Syntax:
```
short <variable-name> = <integer-value>;
```

For example:
```java
short age = 65;
```
```


### Traditional Chinese
參見：

- [Java Programming/Scope#Access modifiers](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Scope#Access_modifiers)

## public
`public` 是一個 Java [關鍵字](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/public)，宣告了成員的[訪問](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Scope)為 public。公共成員對所有其他類都是可見的。這意味著任何其他類都可以訪問一個 `public` 欄位或方法。此外，其他類可以修改 `public` 欄位，除非該字段被聲明為 `final`。

最佳做法是給字段 `private` 訪問權限，並將 `public` 訪問權限僅保留給定義了類的公共常量的一組方法和 `final` 欄位。這有助於封裝和資訊隱藏，因為它允許您更改類的實現，而不影響只使用類的公共 API 的消費者。

以下是一個名為 `Length` 的不可變 `public` 類的示例，它維護了名為 `units` 和 `magnitude` 的 `private` 實例字段，但提供了一個 `public` 構造函數和兩個 `public` 訪問器方法。

```java
package org.wikibooks.java;

public class Length {
   private double magnitude;
   private String units;

   public Length(double magnitude, String units) {
      if ((units == null) || (units.trim().length() == 0)) {
          throw new IllegalArgumentException("non-null, non-empty units required.");
      }

      this.magnitude = magnitude;
      this.units = units;
   }

   public double getMagnitude() {
      return this.magnitude;
   }

   public String getUnits() {
      return this.units;
   }
}
```

## return
`return` 是一個 Java 關鍵字。

返回一個原始值，或一個對象引用，或什麼都不返回(void)。它不返回對象值，只返回對象引用。

語法：
```
return variable;  // --- 返回變量
or
return;           // --- 返回空
```

## short
`short` 是一個關鍵字。它定義了一個 16 位有符號整數[原始類型](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Primitive_Types)。

語法：
```
short <variable-name> = <integer-value>;
```

例如：
```java
short age = 65;
```

</ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="static">static</span></h2><p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/static" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/static" title="Java Programming/Keywords/static">static</a></span></code> 是 Java 關鍵字。它可以應用在字段、方法或<a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Nested_Classes" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Nested_Classes" title="Java Programming/Nested Classes">內部類別</a>。靜態字段、方法或類別對整個定義它的類別來說只有單一實例，即使在程式中並未建立該類別的實例。例如，Java 的入口點 (<code>main()</code>) 必須是靜態的。靜態方法無法是 <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" title="Java Programming/Keywords/abstract">abstract</a></span></code> 的。它必須被放在變數類型或方法返回類型之前。建議將它放在訪問修飾符之後、<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/final" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/final" title="Java Programming/Keywords/final">final</a></span></code> 關鍵字之前：</p><table style="padding:2px; margin:2px;">

- 靜態方法可用於實用功能或不屬於任何特定對象的功能。例如：
  
  <table style="padding:2px; margin:2px;">

 </dd>
</dl><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="strictfp">strictfp</span></h2><p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/strictfp" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/strictfp" title="Java Programming/Keywords/strictfp">strictfp</a></span></code>是Java 1.2以來的一個java關鍵字。</p><p>它確保即使可以獲得更高的精度，浮點計算的結果也能在底層操作系統和硬體平臺上精確相同。這與Java 1.1的先前版本相容。如果需要，可以使用此選項。</p><p>類的語法：</p><pre><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4;<ul>
<li>在子類別方法定義中使用，以呼叫在父類別中定義的方法。無法呼叫父類別的私有方法，只能透過 <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/super" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/super" title="Java Programming/Keywords/super">super</a></span></code> 關鍵字呼叫公開和受保護的方法。</li>
<li>在類別建構子中使用，以呼叫其<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/parent_class" class="extiw" title="w:parent class">父類別</a>的建構子。</li>
<li>在靜態方法中不使用 Super 關鍵字。</li>
</ul>
<p>語法：</p>
<pre><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/super" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/super" title="JavaProgramming/Keywords/super">super</a></span></code>.&lt;method-name&gt;([零個或多個引數]);
</pre>
<p>或:</p>
<pre><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/super" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/super" title="JavaProgramming/Keywords/super">super</a></span></code>([零個或多個引數]);
</pre>
<p>例如:</p>
<table>
<tbody>
<tr valign="top">
<td> 
程式碼清單 1: SuperClass.java
<code>
<pre class="prettyprint linenums">
public class SuperClass {
   public void printHello() {
      System.out.println("Hello from SuperClass");
      return;
   }
}
</pre>
</code>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<table>
<tbody>
<tr valign="top">
<td>

<code>
<pre class="prettyprint linenums">
public class SubClass extends SuperClass {
   public void printHello() {
      super.printHello();
      System.out.println("Hello from SubClass");
      return;
   }
   public static main(String[] args) {
      SubClass obj = new SubClass();
      obj.printHello();
   }
}
</pre>
</code>
</td>
</tr>

</pre>
</code>
</td>

在 Java 1.5 及以上版本中，“super” 關鍵字也用於泛型中指定萬用字元類型參數的下界。

另請參見：
- [extends](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/extends)

## switch
`switch` 是 Java 關鍵字。

它是一種基於數字的分支操作。該“數字”必須是 `char`、`byte`、`short` 或 `int` 原始類型。

語法：
```java
switch ( <integer-var> )
{
   case <label1>: <statements>;
   case <label2>: <statements>;
   ...
   case <labeln>: <statements>;
   default: <statements>;
}
``````html
When the &lt;integer-var&gt; value match one of the &lt;label&gt;, then: The statements after the matched label will be executed including the following label's statements, until the end of the <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/switch" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/switch" title="Java Programming/Keywords/switch">switch</a></span></code> block, or until a <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/break" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/break" title="Java Programming/Keywords/break">break</a></span></code> keyword is reached.
For example:
```

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>32px</td>
      <td style="background-color:#ffeee0; border-left: 4px solid orange; padding-left: 6px; font-family: Monaco, Consolas, 'Courier New', Courier; font-size:1.0em; line-height:1.5 !important;">
        <div>
          <pre><code>int var = 3;
switch ( var )
{
   case 1:
      System.out.println( "Case: 1" );
      System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
      break;		  	
   case 2:
      System.out.println( "Case: 2" );
      System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
      break;
   case 3:
      System.out.println( "Case: 3" );
      System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
      break;  	
   case 4:
      System.out.println( "Case: 4" );
      System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
      break;      
   default:
      System.out.println( "Case: default" );
      System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
      break;	      
}
</code></pre>
        </div></td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

```
The output from the above code is:
```

```
Case: 3
Execute until break
```

```html
The same code can be written with if-else blocks":
```

<table>
  <tbody>
    <tr valign="top">
      <td>32px</td>
      <td style="background-color:#ffeee0; border-left: 4px solid orange; padding-left: 6px; font-family: Monaco, Consolas, 'Courier New', Courier; font-size:1.0em; line-height:1.5 !important;">
        <div>
          <pre><code>int var = 3;
if ( var == 1 ) {
   System.out.println( "Case: 1" );
   System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
} else if ( var == 2 ) {
   System.out.println( "Case: 2" );
   System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
} else if ( var == 3 ) {
   System.out.println( "Case: 3" );
   System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
} else if ( var == 4 ) {
   System.out.println( "Case: 4" );
   System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
} else {
   // -- This is the default part -- 
   System.out.println( "Case: default" );
   System.out.println( "Execute until break" );
}
</code></pre>
        </div></td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table> 
```<p><br>
  See also:</p><ul>
 <li><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/if" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/if" title="Java Programming/Keywords/if">Java Programming/Keywords/if</a></li>
</ul>

## synchronized
`<a>` keyword.
It marks a *critical section*. A *critical section* is where one and only one thread is executing. So to enter into the marked code the threads are *synchronized*, only one can enter, the others have to wait. For more information see [Synchronizing Threads Methods](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Basic_Synchronization) or [5](http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/concurrency/syncmeth.html).

The `<a>` keyword can be used in two ways:
- Create a `<a>` block
- Mark a method `<a>`

A `<a>` block is marked as:

Code section 1: Synchronized block.
```java
synchronized(<object_reference>) {
   // Thread.currentThread() has a lock on object_reference. All other threads trying to access it will
   // be blocked until the current thread releases the lock.
}
```

The syntax to mark a method `<a>` is:

Code section 2: Synchronized method.
```java
public synchronized void method() {
   // Thread.currentThread() has a lock on this object, i.e. a synchronized method is the same as
   // calling { synchronized(this) {…} }.
}
``````html
<p>The synchronization is always associated to an object. If the method is static, the associated object is the class. If the method is non-static, the associated object is the instance. While it is allowed to declare an <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/abstract" title="Java Programming/Keywords/abstract">abstract</a></span></code> method as <code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/synchronized" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/synchronized" title="Java Programming/Keywords/synchronized">synchronized</a></span></code>, it is meaningless to do so since synchronization is an aspect of the implementation, not the declaration, and abstract methods do not have an implementation.</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Singleton_example"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singleton_pattern" class="extiw" title="w:Singleton pattern">Singleton</a> example</span></h2>
<p>As an example, we can show a thread-safe version of a singleton:</p>
<table style="padding:2px; margin:2px;">
 <tbody>
  <tr valign="top">
   <td style="width:32px;"><span typeof="mw:File"><span title="Computer code"><img alt="Computer code" data-savepage-currentsrc="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png" data-savepage-src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png" src="data:image/png;base64," decoding="async" width="32" height="32" class="mw-file-element" data-savepage-srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/48px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/64px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png 2x" srcset="" data-file-width="60" data-file-height="60"></span></span></td>
   <td style="background-color:#ffeee0; border-left: 4px solid orange; padding-left: 6px; font-family: Monaco, Consolas, 'Courier New', Courier; font-size:1.0em; line-height:1.5 !important;"><span id="code-listing-1"><b>Code listing 1: Singleton.java</b></span>
    <div class="mw-highlight mw-content-ltr mw-highlight-lines" dir="ltr">
     <pre>/**
 * The singleton class that can be instantiated only once with lazy instantiation
 */
public class Singleton {
    /** Static class instance */
    private volatile static Singleton instance = null;

    /**
     * Standard private constructor
     */
    private Singleton() {
        // Some initialisation
    }
   
    /**
     * Getter of the singleton instance
     * @return The only instance
     */
    public static Singleton getInstance() {
        if (instance == null) {
            // If the instance does not exist, go in time-consuming
            // section:
            synchronized (Singleton.class) {
                if (instance == null) {
                    instance = new Singleton();
                }
            }
        }

        return instance;
    }
 }</pre>
    </div></td>
  </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="this">this</span></h2>
<p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/this" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/this" title="Java Programming/Keywords/this">this</a></span></code> is a Java keyword. It contains the current object reference.</p>
<ol>
 <li>Solves ambiguity between instance variables and parameters .</li>
 <li>Used to pass current object as a parameter to another method .</li>
</ol>
<p>Syntax:</p>
<pre><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/this" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/this" title="Java Programming/Keywords/this">this</a></span></code>.method();
or
<code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/this" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/this" title="Java Programming/Keywords/this">this</a></span></code>.variable;

</pre>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="throw">throw</span></h2>
<p><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/throw" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/throw" title="Java Programming/Keywords/throw">throw</a></span></code> is a keyword; it 'throws' an exception. In a throw statement, the three types of objects that can be thrown are: <code>Exception</code>, <code>java:Throwable</code>, and <code>java:Error</code></p><p>Syntax:</p><pre><code><span style="color:DodgerBlue4; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;"><a data-savepage-href="/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/throw" href="https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/throw" title="Java Programming/Keywords/throw">throw</a></span></code> &lt;Exception Ref&gt;;
</pre>
<p>For example:</p>
<table style="padding:2px; margin:2px;">
 <tbody>
  <tr valign="top">
   <td style="width:32px;"><span typeof="mw:File"><span title="Computer code"><img alt="Computer code" data-savepage-currentsrc="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png" data-savepage-src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg/32px-Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg.png" src="data:image/png;base64," decoding="async" width="32" height="32" class="mw-file-element" data-savepage-srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/78/Gnome-settings-accessibility-keyboard.svg```markdown
## 參見
- [Java Programming/Keywords/throws](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/throws)

## throws
`throws` 是一個 Java 關鍵字。它用於方法定義中聲明方法拋出的異常。

語法:
```java
public myMethod() throws MyException1, MyException2
{MyException1
  ...
}
```

範例:

```java
class MyDefinedException extends Exception
 {
  public MyDefinedException(String str)
  {
     super(str);
  }
}

public class MyClass
{
    public static void showMyName(String str) throws MyDefinedException
    {
          if(str.equals("What is your Name?"))
                throw new MyDefinedException("My name is Blah Blah");
    }
    public static void main(String a[])
    {
       try
       {
          showMyName("What is your Name?");
       }
       catch(MyDefinedException mde)
       {
          mde.printStackTrace();
       }
     }
 }
```

## transient
`transient` 是一個 Java 關鍵字，當對象持久化到位元組流時，標記成員變數不被序列化。當對象通過網絡傳輸時，該對象需要“序列化”。序列化將對象狀態轉換為位元流。這些位元組被發送到網絡上，並從這些位元組重建對象。被 Java `transient` 關鍵字標記的成員變數不被傳輸；它們是有意故意丟失。

語法:
```java
private transient <member-variable>;
or 
transient private <member-variable>;
```

例如:

```java
public class Foo implements Serializable
{
   private String saveMe;
   private transient String dontSaveMe;
   private transient String password;
   //...
}
```
```另請參閱：
- Java 語言規範參考：[jls](https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se8/html/jls-8.html#jls-8.3.1.3)
- 可序列化介面 [Serializable](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serialization#Java)

## try
`try` 是一個關鍵字。  
它開始一個 try 區塊。如果在 try 區塊內拋出異常，則會將該異常與區塊中的任何 catch 部分進行比較。如果異常與 catch 部分中的一個異常匹配，異常將在那裡處理。

在 try 區塊中可能發生三種事情:
- 沒有拋出異常：
  - 執行 try 區塊中的程式碼
  - 再加上 finally 區塊中的程式碼
  - 再加上 try-catch 區塊後的程式碼
- 拋出異常並且在 catch 區塊中找到匹配：
  - 執行直到發生異常的 try 區塊中的程式碼
  - 再加上匹配的 catch 區塊中的程式碼
  - 再加上 finally 區塊中的程式碼
  - 再加上 try-catch 區塊後的程式碼
- 拋出異常並且在 catch 區塊中找不到匹配：
  - 執行直到發生異常的 try 區塊中的程式碼
  - 再加上 finally 區塊中的程式碼
  - 之後**不執行** try-catch 區塊後的程式碼

例如：

```java
public void method() throws NoMatchedException {
   try {
     //...
     throw new MyException_1();
     //...
   }
   catch (MyException_1 e) {
     // --- 處理異常_1 ---
   }
   catch (MyException_2 e) {
     // --- 處理異常_2 ---
   }
   finally {
     // --- 無論如何都會執行這裡 ---
   }
   // --- 在 try-catch 區塊後的程式碼 ---
}
```
有關如何評估 catch 區塊，請參閱 [Catching Rule](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Throwing_and_Catching_Exceptions#Catching_Rule)

另請參閱：
- [Java Programming/Keywords/catch](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/catch)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/finally](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/finally)
- [Java Programming/Throwing and Catching Exceptions#Catching Rule](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Throwing_and_Catching_Exceptions#Catching_Rule)

## void
`void` 是 Java 關鍵字。  
用於方法的宣告和定義，以指定該方法不返回任何類型，該方法返回 `void`。它不是一種類型，也沒有類似 C/C++ 中的 void 引用/指針。

例如：

```java
public void method()
{
   //...
   return;   // -- 在這種情況下返回是可選的，但不是必需的
   //也不需要使用 public，但會有一些變化
}
```另見：

- [Java Programming/Keywords/return](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/return)

## volatile

`volatile` 是一個關鍵字。

當成員變數標記有這個關鍵字時，它會改變運行時的行為，當多個線程訪問這些變數時會有明顯的變化。沒有 `volatile` 關鍵字，一個線程可能會觀察到另一個線程按照源代碼中未指定的順序更新成員變數。與 `synchronized` 關鍵字不同，允許對 `volatile` 欄位的並發訪問。

語法：

```java
private volatile <member-variable>;
or 
volatile private <member-variable>;
```

例如：

```java
private volatile changingVar;
```

另見：

- [Java Programming/Keywords/synchronized](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/synchronized)

## while

`while` 是 Java 關鍵字。

它開始一個循環區塊。

使用擴展後背斯-瑙爾正規化的一般 `while` 語法是

```
while-looping-statement ::= while condition-clause 
                            single-statement | block-statement

condition-clause   ::= (Boolean Expression)
single-statement   ::= Statement
block-statement    ::= {Statement [Statements]}
```

例如：

```java
while (i < maxLoopIter)
{
    System.out.println("Iter=" + i++);
}
```請參見以下內容：

- [Java Programming/Statements](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Statements)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/for](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/for)
- [Java Programming/Keywords/do](https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Java_Programming/Keywords/do)
